class.name: BrowserPlus
class.description: Yahoo BrowserPlus implementation. This runtime supports these features: dragdrop, jpgresize, pngresize.

method.name: init
method.description: Initializes the browserplus runtime.

param.name: uploader
param.description: Uploader instance that needs to be initialized.

param.name: callback
param.description: Callback to execute when the runtime initializes or fails to initialize. If it succeeds an object with a parameter name success will be set to true.

class.name: Flash
class.description: FlashRuntime implementation. This runtime supports these features: jpgresize, pngresize, chunks.

method.name: init
method.description: Initializes the upload runtime. This method should add necessary items to the DOM and register events needed for operation.

param.name: uploader
param.description: Uploader instance that needs to be initialized.

param.name: callback
param.description: Callback to execute when the runtime initializes or fails to initialize. If it succeeds an object with a parameter name success will be set to true.

class.name: Gears
class.description: Gears implementation. This runtime supports these features: dragdrop, jpgresize, pngresize, chunks.

method.name: init
method.description: Initializes the upload runtime.

param.name: uploader
param.description: Uploader instance that needs to be initialized.

param.name: callback
param.description: Callback to execute when the runtime initializes or fails to initialize. If it succeeds an object with a parameter name success will be set to true.

class.name: Html5
class.description: HMTL5 implementation. This runtime supports these features: dragdrop, jpgresize, pngresize.

method.name: init
method.description: Initializes the upload runtime.

param.name: uploader
param.description: Uploader instance that needs to be initialized.

param.name: callback
param.description: Callback to execute when the runtime initializes or fails to initialize. If it succeeds an object with a parameter name success will be set to true.

class.name: Silverlight
class.description: Silverlight implementation. This runtime supports these features: jpgresize, pngresize, chunks.

method.name: init
method.description: Initializes the upload runtime. This runtime supports these features: jpgresize, pngresize, chunks.

param.name: uploader
param.description: Uploader instance that needs to be initialized.

param.name: callback
param.description: Callback to execute when the runtime initializes or fails to initialize. If it succeeds an object with a parameter name success will be set to true.

class.name: Uploader
class.summary: Uploader class, an instance of this class will be created for each upload field.
class.description: Uploader class, an instance of this class will be created for each upload field.

method.name: Uploader
method.description: Constructs a new uploader instance.

param.name: settings
param.description: Initialization settings, to be used by the uploader instance and runtimes.

property.name: state
property.summary: Current state of the total uploading progress.
property.description: Current state of the total uploading progress. This one can either be plupload.STARTED or plupload.STOPPED. These states are controlled by the stop/start methods. The default value is STOPPED.

property.name: features
property.summary: Map of features that are available for the uploader runtime.
property.description: Map of features that are available for the uploader runtime. Features will be filled before the init event is called, these features can then be used to alter the UI for the end user. Some of the current features that might be in this map is: dragdrop, chunks, jpgresize, pngresize.

property.name: files
property.summary: Current upload queue, an array of File instances.
property.description: Current upload queue, an array of File instances.

property.name: settings
property.summary: Object with name/value settings.
property.description: Object with name/value settings.

property.name: total
property.summary: Total progess information.
property.description: Total progess information. How many files has been uploaded, total percent etc.

property.name: id
property.summary: Unique id for the Uploader instance.
property.description: Unique id for the Uploader instance.

method.name: init
method.summary: Initializes the Uploader instance and adds internal event listeners.
method.description: Initializes the Uploader instance and adds internal event listeners.

method.name: refresh
method.summary: Refreshes the upload instance by dispatching out a refresh event to all runtimes.
method.description: Refreshes the upload instance by dispatching out a refresh event to all runtimes. This would for example reposition flash/silverlight shims on the page.

method.name: start
method.description: Starts uploading the queued files.

method.name: stop
method.summary: Stops the upload of the queued files.
method.description: Stops the upload of the queued files.

method.name: getFile
method.summary: Returns the specified file object by id.
method.description: Returns the specified file object by id.

return.description: File object or undefined if it wasn't found;

method.name: removeFile
method.description: Removes a specific file.

method.name: splice
method.summary: Removes part of the queue and returns the files removed.
method.description: Removes part of the queue and returns the files removed. This will also trigger the FilesRemoved and QueueChanged events.

return.description: Array of files that was removed.

method.name: trigger
method.summary: Dispatches the specified event name and it's arguments to all listeners.
method.description: Dispatches the specified event name and it's arguments to all listeners.

param.name: Multiple
param.description: arguments to pass along to the listener functions.

method.name: bind
method.summary: Adds an event listener by name.
method.description: Adds an event listener by name.

param.name: func
param.description: Function to call ones the event gets fired.

param.name: scope
param.description: Optional scope to execute the specified function in.

method.name: unbind
method.description: Removes the specified event listener.

event.name: Init
event.summary: Fires when the current RunTime has been initialized.
event.description: Fires when the current RunTime has been initialized.

event.name: PostInit
event.summary: Fires after the init event incase you need to perform actions there.
event.description: Fires after the init event incase you need to perform actions there.

event.name: Refresh
event.summary: Fires when the silverlight/flash or other shim needs to move.
event.description: Fires when the silverlight/flash or other shim needs to move.

event.name: StateChanged
event.summary: Fires when the overall state is being changed for the upload queue.
event.description: Fires when the overall state is being changed for the upload queue.

event.name: UploadFile
event.summary: Fires when a file is to be uploaded by the runtime.
event.description: Fires when a file is to be uploaded by the runtime.

event.name: QueueChanged
event.summary: Fires when the file queue is changed.
event.description: Fires when the file queue is changed. In other words when files are added/removed to the files array of the uploader instance.

event.name: UploadProgress
event.summary: Fires while a file is being uploaded.
event.description: Fires while a file is being uploaded. Use this event to update the current file upload progress.

param.name: file
param.description: File that is currently being uploaded.

event.name: FilesRemoved
event.summary: Fires while a file was removed from queue.
event.description: Fires while a file was removed from queue.

param.name: file
param.description: File that is currently being uploaded.

event.name: FilesAdded
event.summary: Fires while when the user selects files to upload.
event.description: Fires while when the user selects files to upload.

param.name: files
param.description: Array of file objects that was selected.

method.name: File
method.description: Constructs a new file instance.

property.name: id
property.summary: File id this is a globally unique id for the specific file.
property.description: File id this is a globally unique id for the specific file.

property.name: name
property.summary: File name for example "myfile.
property.description: File name for example "myfile.gif".

property.name: size
property.summary: File size in bytes.
property.description: File size in bytes.

property.name: loaded
property.summary: Number of bytes uploaded of the files total size.
property.description: Number of bytes uploaded of the files total size.

property.name: percent
property.summary: Number of percentage uploaded of the file.
property.description: Number of percentage uploaded of the file.

property.name: status
property.summary: Status constant matching the plupload states QUEUED, UPLOADING, FAILED, DONE.
property.description: Status constant matching the plupload states QUEUED, UPLOADING, FAILED, DONE.

class.name: Runtime
class.summary: Runtime class gets implemented by each upload runtime.
class.description: Runtime class gets implemented by each upload runtime.

method.name: init
method.description: Initializes the upload runtime. This method should add necessary items to the DOM and register events needed for operation.

param.name: uploader
param.description: Uploader instance that needs to be initialized.

param.name: callback
param.description: Callback function to execute when the runtime initializes or fails to initialize. If it succeeds an object with a parameter name success will be set to true.

class.name: QueueProgress
class.summary: Runtime class gets implemented by each upload runtime.
class.description: Runtime class gets implemented by each upload runtime.

method.name: QueueProgress
method.description: Constructs a queue progress.

property.name: size
property.summary: Total queue file size.
property.description: Total queue file size.

property.name: loaded
property.summary: Total bytes uploaded.
property.description: Total bytes uploaded.

property.name: uploaded
property.summary: Number of files uploaded.
property.description: Number of files uploaded.

property.name: failed
property.summary: Number of files failed to upload.
property.description: Number of files failed to upload.

property.name: queued
property.summary: Number of files yet to be uploaded.
property.description: Number of files yet to be uploaded.

property.name: percent
property.summary: Total percent of the uploaded bytes.
property.description: Total percent of the uploaded bytes.

method.name: reset
method.summary: Resets the progress to it's initial values.
method.description: Resets the progress to it's initial values.

class.name: plupload
class.summary: Plupload class with some global constants and functions.
class.description: Plupload class with some global constants and functions.

property.name: STOPPED
property.summary: Inital state of the queue and also the state ones it's finished all it's uploads.
property.description: Inital state of the queue and also the state ones it's finished all it's uploads.

property.name: STARTED
property.summary: Upload process is running
property.description: Upload process is running

property.name: QUEUED
property.summary: File is queued for upload
property.description: File is queued for upload

property.name: UPLOADING
property.summary: File is being uploaded
property.description: File is being uploaded

property.name: FAILED
property.summary: File has failed to be uploaded
property.description: File has failed to be uploaded

property.name: DONE
property.summary: File has been uploaded successfully
property.description: File has been uploaded successfully

property.name: mimeTypes
property.summary: Mime type lookup table.
property.description: Mime type lookup table.

method.name: extend
method.summary: Extends the specified object with another object.
method.description: Extends the specified object with another object.

return.description: Same as target, the extended object.

method.name: cleanName
method.summary: Cleans the specified name from national characters (diacritics).
method.description: Cleans the specified name from national characters (diacritics). The result will be a name with only a-z, 0-9 and _.

method.name: addRuntime
method.summary: Adds a specific upload runtime like for example flash or gears.
method.description: Adds a specific upload runtime like for example flash or gears.

method.name: guid
method.description: Generates an unique ID. This is 99.99% unique since it takes the current time and 5 random numbers. The only way a user would be able to get the same ID is if the two persons at the same exact milisecond manages to get 5 the same random numbers between 0-65535 it also uses a counter so each call will be guaranteed to be page unique. It's more probable for the earth to be hit with an ansteriod.

method.name: formatSize
method.summary: Formats the specified number as a size string for example 1024 becomes 1 KB.
method.description: Formats the specified number as a size string for example 1024 becomes 1 KB.

method.name: getPos
method.summary: Returns the absolute x, y position of an Element.
method.description: Returns the absolute x, y position of an Element. The position will be returned in a object with x, y fields.

param.name: node
param.description: HTML element or element id to get x, y position from.

param.name: root
param.description: Optional root element to stop calculations at.

return.description: Absolute position of the specified element object with x, y fields.

method.name: parseSize
method.summary: Parses the specified size string into a byte value.
method.description: Parses the specified size string into a byte value. For example 10kb becomes 10240.

param.name: size
param.description: String to parse or number to just pass through.

method.name: xmlEncode
method.description: Encodes the specified string.

method.name: toArray
method.description: Forces anything into an array.
